Ingredients.5: 1 cup unsalted butter, melted and cooled

Ingredients.7: 1 large apple - peeled, cored, and diced

Ingredients.8: 0.25 cup golden raisins, or to taste

Ingredients.9: 0.5 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Generously grease a 9x13-inch baking pan.

Directions.2: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rapid boil. Cook egg noodles at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, 7 to 9 minutes. Drain and set aside.

Directions.3: While noodles are cooking, mix sour cream, cheese, sugar, and butter together in a large bowl. Add eggs, apple, and raisins. Add drained egg noodles and cinnamon; stir until well combined. Pour into the prepared pan.

Directions.4: Bake in the preheated oven until slightly golden brown and custard has set, about 1 hour. Cool for 10 to 15 minutes before serving.
